selections.name: SON OF ASTAR
selections.reason: Consistent speed figures in the high 50s/60 range (56, 57, 60) which are superior to the field average. Drawn well in barrier 7 to stalk the pace.

selections.name: THECOFFEEPODDOTCO
selections.reason: Showed high speed capability with a 67 figure two starts back. Recent form is solid (3rd, 2nd) and barrier 3 is favorable for this distance.

selections.name: GUSTAV GRAVES
selections.reason: Proven winner at this level with a 63 speed figure win in December. Consistent runner who fits the class.

selections.name: BANG ON THE BELL
selections.reason: Dropping into a suitable spot. Has back class figures that would be competitive here if he can recapture form.

danger_horse.name: THECOFFEEPODDOTCO
danger_horse.reason: If he repeats his 67 speed figure effort from Jan 2nd, he could easily win this race.

selections.name: SPACE INVASION (IRE)
selections.reason: Dominant last-out winner with a massive 80 speed figure, significantly higher than the competition's average of mid-70s.

selections.name: SOVEREIGN WEALTH
selections.reason: Consistent performer with back-to-back 77 speed figures. Won comfortably last time out.

selections.name: TRY STORM CAT (IRE)
selections.reason: Ran a solid 77 speed figure in last outing. Fits well here as a primary contender for the placings.

selections.name: MASKATTO
selections.reason: Won maiden last out with a 68 figure. Improving type but needs to step up to match the top two.

danger_horse.name: SOVEREIGN WEALTH
danger_horse.reason: Very consistent and in winning form. If the top pick regresses, this horse is the logical winner.

selections.name: CELTIC JOHN (IRE)
selections.reason: Coming off a win with a 51 speed figure. Consistent recent form in a race full of inconsistent runners.

selections.name: POKE THE BEAR (IRE)
selections.reason: Has shown ability with multiple 50 speed figures. If he avoids trouble (ran a 7 recently), he is a major player.

selections.name: VOLENDAM
selections.reason: Ran a 53 three starts back which is competitive here. Recent form is dull but capable of waking up.

selections.name: DION BAKER (IRE)
selections.reason: Figures of 41 and 47 put him in the mix for minor awards in a weak field.

danger_horse.name: POKE THE BEAR (IRE)
danger_horse.reason: Highest ceiling in the race but risky floor.

selections.name: TILSWORTH MAX
selections.reason: Won last out with a 50 speed figure. Offers better value than the favorite while matching the top speed figures.

selections.name: ROYAL JET
selections.reason: Consistent figures (47, 48, 50). The horse to beat on paper but short odds (9-5).

selections.name: VITALLINE
selections.reason: Has a 50 speed figure three starts back. Capable of hitting the board at a price.

selections.name: SARABI
selections.reason: Ran a 49 last time out, putting her right in the mix for the exotics.

danger_horse.name: ROYAL JET
danger_horse.reason: Very consistent and likely to run his race. Hard to leave out of any wagers.

selections.name: TOMMY'S PROMISE
selections.reason: On a three-race win streak with improving speed figures (60 -> 62 -> 66). Form is impeccable.

selections.name: ALTA RICA
selections.reason: Posted a field-best 72 speed figure in last start. The main danger to the top pick.

selections.name: MEET ME IN MERAKI
selections.reason: Ran a 72 two starts back. If he returns to that form, he is a massive threat.

selections.name: KING'S HAND
selections.reason: Consistent mid-60s speed figures (63, 64, 69). Reliable for the bottom of exotics.

danger_horse.name: ALTA RICA
danger_horse.reason: Speed figure of 72 is superior to the top pick's best. If he repeats that, he wins.

selections.name: CHHOTA SAAB
selections.reason: Standout speed figure of 71 two starts back. In a maiden field, this experience and speed is decisive.

selections.name: SILENT STRIKE (IRE)
selections.reason: First time starter from the powerful Andrew Balding yard. Respect the connections.

selections.name: SAKURA SPIRIT (IRE)
selections.reason: Ran a 48 in debut. Should improve with experience.

selections.name: BUCKLOW HILL (IRE)
selections.reason: First time starter from Charles Hills stable. Watch betting market.

danger_horse.name: SILENT STRIKE (IRE)
danger_horse.reason: Unknown quantity from a top trainer. Could be anything.

exotic_strategy.strategy: Win Bet #2. Exacta 2-3. Saver on 3 to win.

selections.name: ALL TOO BEAUTIFUL
selections.reason: Won last two starts with figures of 67 and 62. In peak form and drawn on the rail.

selections.name: PORFIN (IRE)
selections.reason: Won last out and has back class. Consistent runner.

selections.name: MART
selections.reason: Ran a 67 two starts back. Competitive at this level.

selections.name: INVINCIBLE SPEED (IRE)
selections.reason: Speed figure of 63 puts him in the conversation for placings.

danger_horse.name: PORFIN (IRE)
danger_horse.reason: Recent winner who knows how to get the job done.
